Columns.Name: 工事見積_見積手配待ち件数
工事見積_見積手配保留件数
工事見積_設計待ち件数
工事見積_見積催促中件数
工事見積_設計審査中件数
工事見積_修正依頼中件数
工事見積_審査保留件数
工事見積_審査完了件数
工事見積_受注確定待ち件数
工事見積_リマインド予定件数

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select sum((`c`.`estimate_arrange_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_見積手配待ち件数`,sum((`c`.`estimate_arrange_pending_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_見積手配保留件数`,sum((`c`.`design_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_設計待ち件数`,sum((`c`.`estimate_reminder_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_見積催促中件数`,sum((`c`.`design_examination_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_設計審査中件数`,sum((`c`.`requesting_correction_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_修正依頼中件数`,sum((`c`.`pending_review_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_審査保留件数`,sum((`c`.`examination_complete_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_審査完了件数`,sum((`c`.`order_wait_flg` = 1)) AS `工事見積_受注確定待ち件数`,sum(((`c`.`design_wait_flg` = 1) and (`b`.`active_flg` = 1) and (`d`.`complete_flg` = 0) and (`a`.`estimate_reminder_flg` = 1) and (`a`.`estimate_reminder_date` = curdate()))) AS `工事見積_リマインド予定件数` from (((`t_object_construction_estimate` `a` join `t_object_order` `b` on((`a`.`object_order_id` = `b`.`object_order_id`))) join `m_construction_estimate_status` `c` on((`a`.`construction_estimate_status_id` = `c`.`construction_estimate_status_id`))) join `m_order_status` `d` on((`b`.`order_status_id` = `d`.`order_status_id`))) where ((`b`.`active_flg` = 1) and ((`c`.`estimate_arrange_wait_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`estimate_arrange_pending_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`design_wait_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`estimate_reminder_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`design_examination_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`requesting_correction_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`pending_review_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`examination_complete_flg` = 1) or (`c`.`order_wait_flg` = 1)))
